General.Name: Genoray Co. Ltd
General.Description: Genoray Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells medical and dental imaging systems in South Korea. It offers medical systems, such as flat panel detector and image intensifier C-arm, ENT CBCT, digital mammography, and analog mammography systems; and dental systems comprising dental X-ray imaging systems, portable X-ray systems, and various sensors. The company also provides Triana, Zenis, and Smartmam software solutions. Genoray Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
